TROLL climate parameters over months

Source: R/TROLLv3_climatedaytime12.R
TROLLv3_climatedaytime12.Rd

Climate parameters used by TROLL model over months.

TROLLv3_climatedaytime12

Format

A data frame with 12 rows and 12 variables:

Temperature

temperature (degree C)

DaytimeMeanTemperature

mean day temperature (degree C)

NightTemperature

night temperature (degree C)

Rainfall

rainfall (mm)

WindSpeed

wind speed (km/h)

DaytimeMeanIrradiance

daytime mean irradiance

MeanIrradiance

mean irradiance

SaturatedVapourPressure

saturated vapour pressure (Pa)

VapourPressure

vapour pressure (Pa)

VaporPressureDeficit

vapour pressure deficit (VPD, Pa)

DayTimeVapourPressureDeficitVPDbasic

daytime basic VPD (Pa)

DaytimeMeanVapourPressureDeficit

daytime mean VPF (Pa)
